channel.title: Just need a little help with starting positions
channel.description: hi, im a begginer/intermediate coder im just wondering how can i change the starting position when i login, this is not in the client.java or playerhandler.java

item.title: Just need a little help with starting positions
item.dc:creator: @Elite1 Elite™
item.description:
@Elite1 wrote:

[quote=“moody757, post:3, topic:217307”]1. Ok so first open up:

•Player.java

  1. Search for: (CTRL+F To search)
// initial x and y coordinates of the player
  1. When you do you will see this

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3098;//3072; teleportToY = 3495;//3312;

from this point on its very simple.

Change the Co ordiantes to where you want them to start

NOTE: CHANGE ONLY THESE CO ORDINATES

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3098;//3072; teleportToY = 3495;//3312;[/quote]
O thats right…I’m using a completely custom server lawls forgot about old servers

Read full topic
item.source: Just need a little help with starting positions
